stories.text:
Hi, I’m Iddo Tal, a Silicon Valley-based entrepreneur and the founder of 5 startups. The last one was acquired by Google. I’m hosting a LIVE online bootcamp this weekend to help startup founders learn how to raise money! It's an active workshop where I’ll take you through the rolling closing method I used to raise money from over 100+ investors including F50, Ashton Kutcher, the richest family in Asia and executives from Google, Facebook, Paypal, Snap, Yahoo and Spotify.

The bootcamp includes hands-on training on: - How to create an elevator pitch that attracts investors - How to pitch to the four investor personality types - The basics of the rolling closing fundraising method Do you know anyone who’s raising money for their startup? Please forward this to them! See you at the bootcamp. Let’s Raise The Round!

==> Learn more and join at raisetheround.com
stories.title: Startup Fundraising Bootcamp this weekend – starts tomorrow
